name: Office Survivors (Shakespeare's Revenge)
description:
Shakespeare has had enough of being ignored by modern kids with their smart phones and internets. He's returned from the dead to take revenge and return the world to olden days, when all a person needed was some parchment, a quill pen and some fresh ink! Will reciting Hamlet be enough for him to overcome the contents of the office stationary?

Move around the screen with WASD or arrow keys to avoid the enemies. smite them with your abilities! Collect experience gems to level up and upgrade your abilities.

Written during the GameDev.tv 2022 game jam
